recipe_text: Measurement; 120; Prepare 120 grams of flour.| Measurement; 150; Prepare 150 grams of sugar| Untimed; None; Prepare a teaspoon of salt and cinnamon each| Untimed; None; Prepare a stick of butter and melt it down in a bowl. Add all your prepared ingredients and stir until crumbly| Quantity; 6; Prepare and slice 6 apples| Measurement; 100; Prepare 100 grams of sugar| Measurement; 20; Prepare 20 grams of flour| Untimed; None; Combine these new ingredients in a bowl. Do not add in the earlier butter mixture yet.| Untimed; None; Transfer apple mixture to a baking dish and spread the butter mixture on top| Untimed; None; Heat oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit| Timed; 2400; Bake mixture for 40 minutes| Finish; None; Serve!
title: Beurre Blanc Sauce Steak
